about_the_game:
Game Title: School Curse 3

Genre: Horror

Overview:

A girl wakes up in a school one day. However, this is not her usual school, but a strange dimension filled with mysterious monsters. The girl must collect 10 magical books to escape this dimension.

This dimension was once a place where an evil power was sealed. However, the seal was broken, and the evil power has returned, causing the dimension to reappear.

The girl must escape this dimension.

Gameplay:

The game is played from a third-person perspective. The player controls the girl as she collects the magical books.

If the girl is spotted by a monster, she will be attacked and the game will end.

The game ends when the player collects 10 magical books. Once 10 books have been collected, the girl can escape the dimension.

The player can avoid monster attacks by hiding in a moving locker.

Features:

This is a horror game set in a strange dimension filled with mysterious monsters.

The player can experience a thrilling escape game as they collect magical books.

The game is full of tension as the player avoids monster attacks and searches for magical books.

As the third installment in the School Curse series, the game features connections to the previous games.

Target Audience:

All ages

Number of Players:

1

Playtime:

About 5 minutes

Difficulty:

Intermediate

Release Date:

February 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460, Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game play at 1080p/60fps is possible with the graphics "low" setting. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
